intro: AI full-stack developer currently working at udaanCapital, building risk assessment systems.
Built 150+ projects including production applications with thousands of active users.
Specialized in automation, GenAI solutions, and full-stack development with modern frameworks.
Creator of NoteRep - a study platform serving 200+ active users with 85K+ views.
I write about tech, build tools that save time, and contribute to meaningful projects.
personal.goal: I build automation tools and AI-powered solutions that eliminate manual processes and save people time.
